creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: broad band across top with 3 attached rectangular panels which lays on top of bottom panel; orange and red borders surround lower panel; 5 small and 1 large embroidered square in white, red and gold on black surrounded by geometric applique in similar colors; band and 3 panels have narrow applique in red, white, orange, black, green and yellow and center cross stitching
title: Baby Carrier
